thread.title: Can a pilot program keep prisoners from going back to jail?
thread.title_full: Video: Can a pilot program keep prisoners from going back to jail? | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Can a pilot program keep prisoners from going back to jail?
text: In the second part of our series looking at how prison recidivism can be reduced, NewsHour follows three inmates, Jordan Taylor, Carlos Colon and Ashley Wilson as they move from prison back to everyday life, in our series “Broken Justice.” William Brangham reports.
